author: mirichmo
body:
Fixes #2598

I modified:
1. The native component build scripts to produce x86 binaries
2. The MSI packaging process to produce x86 MSIs
3. The build script to support both actions
4. The project.json files to add win7-x86 support

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body:
@raghushantha - Please review the WiX changes
@nitinbps - Please review the build changes

title: Adding x86 support for Win 7
